import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import {Link, useHistory} from 'react-router-dom'; import {postRecipe, getRecipeType} from '../actions/index'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; export default function RecipeCreate (){ const dispatch = useDispatch(); const types = useSelector((state) => state.recipeTypes); //tengo que renderizar el formulario y poder guardarlo en un estado const [input, setInput] = useState({ name: "", score:"", healthylevel:"", resume: "", stepbystep:"", image:"", diets:[], }) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getRecipeType()) },[dispatch]) //renderizo return(

Create uyour own recipe!

) }
